title: Export Report Pdf
description: OpenCTI ExportReportPdf connector allows exporting PDF based reports for the following entities: Report (Analysis), Intrusion Set, and Threat Actor. The PDF may be useful for sharing threat intelligence with an external entity in a nice, well-groomed format.
short_description: OpenCTI ExportReportPdf connector allows exporting PDF based reports for the following entities: Report (Analysis), Intrusion Set, and Threat Actor. The PDF may be useful for sharing threat intelligence with an external entity in a nice, well-groomed format.
